At 07:06 21/04/2007, you wrote:


>On Apr 20, 2007, at 1:40 PM, Ian Badcoe wrote:
>
>>either my inv-abs function or else the
>>piece-wise function
>
>Hi Ian,
>
>Can you provide the definitions of these two functions?

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/neat/message/1031

>Isn't the non-linearity of the activation function 
>important?  Besides that, I tend to think that just about any NE 
>algorithm could evolve around a wide range of activation functions 
>(and, as previously discussed, activation algorithms).

Depends what you mean by non-linearity.  I tend to think that the 
fact that it is asymptotic matters, and there's all sorts of unwieldy 
philosophical thoughts about whether an output range of 0 - 1 or -1 - 
1 is better, but they are unwieldy and inconclusive and I'm not sure 
I can put them into words...

         Ian
